about_the_game:
Welcome to Organosphere – an epic sci-fi adventure that catapults you into the chaos-ridden remnants of Johannesburg, now ominously known as Johazardousburg. In the year 2042, a city once teeming with life lies in ruin, strangled by vines and infested with monstrous overgrown insects. An unknown virus of organic origin has unleashed this horror, and the last surviving research heads find themselves wrongfully blamed for the disaster.

As a relentless rescue operative sent from the SEV Arcadia, your mission is to rescue the survivors and unveil the cryptic truth behind the virus. The Arcadia, or "The Prawn," your spaceship hub in orbit over South Africa, will be your high-tech fortress in the sky. From its metallic confines, you'll strategize your next move, utilizing an arsenal of features that place victory within your grasp:

  • Beam Up to The Prawn: When the battle heats up, ascend to the Arcadia and plan your next assault, overlooking the dystopian landscape below.
  • Summon Your Motorcycle: With just a call, beam down a special armored motorcycle to your location and tear through the streets, outrunning your enemies.
  • Customizable Weaponry: Forge a unique weapon that adapts to your style, capable of transforming into over 70 different combinations, all customizable on the fly.
  • Tactical Air Strikes: From the Arcadia, deploy mini drop ships to lay waste to enemy positions, turning the tide of battle in an instant.
  • Reload Drones: Never fear running out of ammo. Special drones, dispatched from the Arcadia, resupply you when the stakes are high.
  • Face Numerous Enemies: Battle both oversized bugs hungry for chaos and cleanup soldiers who view you as a threat.
  • Slow Motion Adrenaline: Feel the rush of bullet time, where every shot becomes a ballet of destruction, and every moment is magnified in heart-pounding slow motion.

Join the fight. Unravel the truth. Immerse yourself in Organosphere.
detailed_description:
Welcome to Organosphere – an epic sci-fi adventure that catapults you into the chaos-ridden remnants of Johannesburg, now ominously known as Johazardousburg. In the year 2042, a city once teeming with life lies in ruin, strangled by vines and infested with monstrous overgrown insects. The Arcadia, or "The Prawn," your spaceship hub in orbit over South Africa, will be your high-tech fortress in the sky.   • Customizable Weaponry: Forge a unique weapon that adapts to your style, capable of transforming into over 70 different combinations, all customizable on the fly.

  • Slow Motion Adrenaline: Feel the rush of bullet time, where every shot becomes a ballet of destruction, and every moment is magnified in heart-pounding slow motion.

Join the fight. Unravel the truth. Immerse yourself in Organosphere.

name: Organosphere

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 7000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 900

short_description: FPS Shooter set in post-apocalyptic Johannesburg South Africa
